content:
I am a Teaching Assistant in Computer Engineering at Boğaziçi University. Also, I am studying for a MSc degree and hold a BSc degree in the same department. My research interests include deep learning, cheminformatics and natural language processing.
I am working under supervision of Arzucan Özgür and Elif Özkırımlı.

title: Gökçe Uludoğan

summary: an automatic playlist generator using songs' features and lyrics with the trained dataset or user's liked songs in Spotify
title: Automatic Playlist Generator

summary: A personalized and interactive music recommendation tool with bandit approach
title: Interactive Music Recommender
